children.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/static.flickr.com/38/123927768_085db1f4f2.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/123927768/ "photo sharing") [Dollar](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/123927768/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
This picture is a blast from the past in two ways. First of all, it’s four and a half years old, taken with my first digital camera. And secondly, it’s of the place where I grew up, the small Scottish town of Dollar. Why, yes, I *am* feeling reflective right now.
